section_title:
15f20 - OT payments not required by
DBRA.
text:
No OT requirements are
included in DBRA; OT provisions to employees subject to the DBRA will depend on
coverage under CWHSSA and/or FLSA.
html: No OT requirements are included in DBRA; OT provisions to employees subject to the DBRA will depend on coverage under CWHSSA and/or FLSA.
